javelin.model.unit

Class Skills

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.unit.Skills
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Skills
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Keeps track of skill ranks of a certain Monster. Usually instead of rolling the skills as usual most of the time it's implied a take 10 is being used, by various reasons, such as prevent scumming (trying the same action many times until you get a high roll) and having to use the random number generator inside BattleAi. Synergy bonuses are not being used for now. See doc/skills.txt guide for more information. TODO it would probably be better to have this as an Enum,Integer Map. This way would allow more programmatic freedom on stuff like Skills.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
